text: We analysed the mean slope (the average change per 6 months) within each group to assess the effect of the intervention over time. We performed the statistical analyses with Stata/SE version 14 and SPSS version 22. All analyses were adjusted for cluster and individual levels of sampling. Significance was set at p < .05 for the primary outcome.
sentences: We analysed the mean slope (the average change per 6 months) within each group to assess the effect of the intervention over time.
We performed the statistical analyses with Stata/SE version 14 and SPSS version 22.
All analyses were adjusted for cluster and individual levels of sampling.
Significance was set at p < .05 for the primary outcome.
